text.section: While in office, the Comptroller shall be covered by a surety bond as required in this section.

The surety bond of the Comptroller shall:
run to the State;
be in the amount of $200,000;
be with surety that the Governor approves; and
be conditioned on the Comptroller:
accounting for the funds that are received under color of office; and
otherwise discharging faithfully each duty of office.
After execution and approval of a surety bond under this section, the surety bond shall be recorded in the office of the Clerk of the Court of Appeals.
